OOC: I just wanted everyone to know my main objective for the Geotrons 
(hey every faction needs one) will be surplus weapons so they can 
stand a chance when we get to Cybertron which will put the Maxis and 
Preds at an advantage (they would enivitably have tons of noisemakers 
and battle cruisers speaking of which if we're going to Cybertron 
wouldn't battle cruisers need to be unbanned?). Oh and all council 
members should look in there e-mails for "Optimus" except raqua who 
already responded and Rudra who responded (but I sent it to him under 
another title).

BIC: Stallex gets there and takes 10 ft. of cord (or whatever robots 
use for rope) and the parts to make a small energon bomb (nothing 
ground breaking say a normal coal mine explosion).

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> Stallex decides he has a big enough pile for now. He hopes on his 
> hover-cycle and heads towards Gorzo's shuttle to see what he can 
> salvage.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> > Bored out of his skull Stallex begins pulling down the stable 
> energon 
> > crystals and piling them up.
> > 
> > Stallex: Hmm ignious rock. I'm not much of a geologist, but it 
looks 
> > like a volcanic eruption stabilized this energon. We'll need 
another 
> > geothermal scan to make sure it's safe soon.
